new.title: New Workflow
new.subtitle: Create a new automation workflow.

trigger.manual: This workflow starts manually. You will need to trigger it yourself from the workflow details page.
trigger.lead_added: This workflow starts when a new lead is added to your workspace. It can be further refined by source and minimum priority.
trigger.inbound_reply: This workflow starts when an inbound reply is received. You can specify which inbox to monitor and filter by keywords.
trigger.scheduled: This workflow starts at a scheduled time based on a cron expression. For example, it can run daily, weekly, or monthly.

new.trust_note: By creating this workflow, you agree to our terms of service and acknowledge that this workflow will consume credits based on its execution.

trigger.hint: Choose how this workflow will be activated.

lead_added.title: Lead Added Trigger
lead_added.hint: Triggers when a new lead is added to the workspace, optionally filtered by source or priority.

inbound_reply.title: Inbound Reply Trigger
inbound_reply.hint: Triggers when an inbound reply is received, optionally filtered by inbox or keywords.

scheduled.title: Scheduled Trigger
scheduled.hint: Triggers at a specific time or recurring schedule.

done.title: Done
done.hint: Marks the end of the workflow execution.
